title: Yiquan Gu
text:
Professor of Spatial Economics and Industrial Organization at Henley Business School, University of Reading
British Academy and Bridging Responsible AI Divides Innovation Fellow at the Digital Regulation Cooperation Forum
Associate Editor, Economic Modelling
Main research interests: Industrial Organization, Digital Economy and Behavioural Economics


Recent Publications

Firm Prominence and Price Framing (with Ioana Chioveanu and Tobias Wenzel), Journal of Economic Behavior and Organization, forthcoming
Park Life: the difference between having financial information and understanding it on park home owners’ quality of life (with Alexander Lord, Richard Dunning, Ian Wilson and Thomas Moore), Working Paper, Town Planning Review, December 2025



Working Papers

Exclusive data, price manipulation and market leadership (with Leo Madio and Carlo Reggiani)

title: CV and Contact
text:
2022 - : Professor of Spatial Economics and Industrial Organization, Henley Business School, University of Reading
2011 - 2022: Lecturer (2011-15), Senior Lecturer (2015-19) and Reader (2019-2022) in Economics, University of Liverpool Management School

2020 - 2022: Institutional Lead for the North West Social Science Doctoral Training Partnership

2006 - 2011: Wissenschaftlicher Mitarbeiter in Forschung und Lehre, TU Dortmund University
